front.title: Session Description Protocol (SDP) Extension for a SIP Connection Address Type

abstract.t: This memo describes use cases, requirements, and protocol extensionsfor using the Session Description Protocol (SDP) Offer/Answer modelfor a SIP connection address type in order to provide a mechanismwhich allows the transport of a SIP URI within the SDP connectionline, for use when the actual IP addresses are not known at offer/answer time.
